Name: 7Days Origins
About the game: This is a place for those who gather to receive a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in the structure of time. Members sometimes become friends, and sometimes turn out to be enemies in order to finish their own assignment. Kirel, our amnesiac protagonist who has forgotten even his own name is put on a test. Everything depends on your choice. You only have 7 days! And what would be your choice? features - Casual gameplay in instant messaging format - Mystery text adventure - Your choice impact the story and relationships between characters - Every character has their own secret and story - A lot of challenges and collectibles - A multi-episode story with branching paths that leads to four different endings Everything depends on your choices.
Meta Title: 7Days Origins: May 2, 2021, Buff Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on 7Days Origins? Check out the release date (May 2, 2021), developer insights from Buff Studio, and a complete game summary.
